column4: what is the best technique to clean up the dpkg database. I've just removed postfix and exim packages from abox, and rebooted however dpkg -l still shows postfix as rc  postfix                                2.2.10-1ubuntu0.1
man apt-get shows that the clean and --list-cleanup options are useful to these ends. i just ensure that i dpkg -P some.deb however
clean however only clears out the /var/cache/apt/archives i believe
